detail_desc: Short dress in jersey crêpe with cap sleeves, frills at the top that continue over the sleeves, and a seam under the bust. Lined.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative gathers around the neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam under the bust. Satin lining.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline and dropped shoulders.
Fitted vest top in ribbed silk jersey with a deep V-neck.
V-neck body in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Top with a motif on the front and long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in sturdy, patterned jersey with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper in a cotton knit with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Small appliqué at the hem.
Shorts in soft jersey with side pockets and wide elastication with smocking at the waist for a more comfortable fit.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins), long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Pyjama bottoms in supersoft, patterned viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative bow at the front and 3/4-length straight legs with elasticated lace trims at the hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats at the front. Double yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Sandals in mesh with imitation leather details. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front and a small loop at the back. Scuba linings, cotton insoles and sturdy soles with a good grip.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in a textured bouclé weave with a concealed zip at the back and fake front pockets with a decorative button.
Top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and short raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.

Cargo jacket in twill made from a cotton blend with a high stand-up collar with a decorative zip, and shoulder tabs with a press-stud. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press stud, and side pockets. Concealed elastic drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated waist. UPF 50.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on the shoulder. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined.
Knitted jumper for a dog with pompoms on the back, a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back. Length at the top approx. 30 cm, circumference of collar 34 cm.
Briefs in organic cotton with a low, V-shaped waist with a lace trim, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Trousers in a soft weave with a regular waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Narrow, detachable belt, side pockets, fake back pockets with a button, and tapered legs.
Block-coloured sports swimsuit with a zip at the top, small collar and long raglan sleeves. Lined at the front and gusset.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.
Base layer tights in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy twill with a high waist, zip fly and tab with press-studs. Fake welt pockets front and back, and tapered legs with creases.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print. Double-layered drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Large scarf in an airy, patterned weave with short fringes along the short sides.

Glittery, printed trainers with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned, transparent soles with motion-activated flashing LED lights in various colours.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and straight, wide legs with creases.
Hairband in woven fabric with a decorative knot at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Bomber jacket in soft faux fur with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip with a pendant in the shape of a pixelated speech bubble, pockets in the side seams, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Gently flared top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Slip-on trainers in cotton twill with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) soles. Heel 8 cm.

Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with frills around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounced sleeves and an elasticated seam and bow at the waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a frill trim over the shoulders.
Dress in soft modal and cotton jersey with a wide, smocked neckline, short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the waist.

Set with a T-shirt and joggers in soft cotton. T-shirt in soft, printed jersey. Joggers in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Tuxedo jacket in twill with a shawl collar, a covered button at the front and buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Metal chain belt with a small, detachable purse in imitation leather. Belt with an adjustable carabiner hook fastening. Purse with a flap and press-stud. Size of purse 9x12 cm.
Short top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs. The top is layered over a longer, sewn-in strappy top.
Short jacket in washed cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 4.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey with elastication at the top, a visible zip at the back and a raw-edge hem.
Sleeveless top in a rib knit with wide, rib-knit shoulder straps that join at the back.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, back pockets and stripes down the sides of the legs.

Wide dress in airy chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar and V-neck with a drawstring at the top. Wide, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers ending in a flounce at the hem. Lined.

A-line dress in airy chiffon with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Frill trimmed seam at the top and long, wide sleeves with a frill-trimmed seam. Lined.
Skirt in glittery tulle with an elasticated waist and satin underskirt.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with gathered shoulders and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pockets with foldover edges, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal hoop earrings with a plastic bead. Length 3.5 cm.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Court shoes in imitation suede with peep toes and open sides. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Slides in soft leather with square toes and leather linings and insoles. Heel 1 cm.

Derby shoes in imitation suede with a hole pattern, open lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam and braided jute trim around the soles. Canvas and imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in cotton corduroy with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Boxy-style jumper in a fluffy jacquard knit with a rib-knit turtle neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Long, fruit-shaped metal earrings with faceted plastic stones. Length 6.5 cm.
Dress with a soft jersey bodice, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.

Short top in a stretch weave with a sweetheart neckline, smocking at the back and gathered, vertical seams at the front to create a draped effect. Short, elasticated puff sleeves in airy organza and elastication over the shoulders. Jersey lining at the front.
